# coder templates pull

Download the latest version of a template to a path.

## Usage

```console
coder templates pull <name> [destination] [flags]
```

## Flags

### --tar

output the template as a tar archive to stdout
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default | <code>false</code> |

### --yes, -y

Bypass prompts
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default | <code>false</code> |
